name: Foss conference
template:
{{ title }}

{{ subtitle }}

23-24 July 2022 | {{ values }}

Schedule

name: Conference description
Conference Title
template:
{% set conference = frappe.db.sql("SELECT title, subtitle, venu, action_button_url, action_button_label, start_date, end_date, logo FROM `tabConference` where city = %(city)s and year=%(year)s ", args, as_dict=true )%} {% set talks = frappe.db.sql("SELECT t.name FROM `tabConference` c inner JOIN `tabConference Talks` t on c.name = t.parent where lower(c.city) = lower(%(city)s) and c.year=%(year)s limit 1", args, as_dict=True )%} {% if conference[0].logo %} {% endif %}

{{ conference[0].title }}

{{ conference[0].subtitle }}

| {{ conference[0].venu }}

{% if talks %} Schedule {% endif %} {% if conference[0].action_button_label %} {{ conference[0].action_button_label }} {% endif %}

name: Conference Sponsors
Conference Partners
Conference Venue
Conference Volunteers
template:
{% set volunteers = frappe.db.sql("SELECT m.full_name, m.photo, m.short_intro FROM `tabConference` c inner JOIN `tabConference Volunteers` v on c.name = v.parent inner JOIN `tabConference Members` as m on v.member = m.name where lower(c.city) = lower(%(city)s) and c.year=%(year)s group by m.name", args, as_dict=true )%} {% if volunteers %}

Volunteers

Folks running the show behind the scenes.

{% for volunteer in volunteers%}
{{ volunteer.full_name }}
{{ volunteer.short_intro }}.
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}

name: Conference Schedule
Conference Talk Proposal
Conference Submissions
template:
{% set cfp = frappe.db.sql("""SELECT t.* from `tabConference Talks` as t inner join `tabConference` as c on t.conference = c.name where lower(c.city)=lower(%(city)s) and c.year = %(year)s and is_break = 0 order by title""", args, as_dict=True)%}
{% for proposal in cfp %}

{{ proposal.title | truncate (50) }}

{{ frappe.utils.format_duration(proposal.expected_duration_of_talk) }}

{% endfor %}
